name: Tale of Dignity
description:
Trade this with the traveling historian, Elisa.
<c=@Flavor>We, the mighty kings and queens, are only as respected as the most vulnerable among us.</c>

name: Rabid Tempered Scale Chestplate of the Revenant
Supreme Rune of Holding
description:
Used to craft larger slot bags, boxes, and packs.
<c=@Flavor>Elonians have made great advances by repurposing older magics.</c>

name: Feline Water Pistol
description: The inscription claims this can harmlessly shoo any domesticated cat off of furniture. Purchase price includes immediate delivery to your home.

name: Tournament Title Scroll: Best of the Best
Weathered Prayer Beads
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>Sometimes, these are brought because they're valuable, but often, a connection to home and better times is reason enough. </c>

name: 24-Slot Courier's Locker
description: 24 slots. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Firelight
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear firelight recipe.

name: Hamaseen Ingot Crate
description:
Can contain ingots of iron, darksteel, bronze, or gold.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Elonian Glove Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Superior Rune of the Weaver
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; gain barrier after executing a <c=@abilitytype>Stance</c> ability.

name: Mini Awakened Occultist
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Gloves
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Gloves recipe.

name: Chunk of Granite
description: Double-click to turn 10 Chunks of Granite into a Slab of Architecture-Grade Granite.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Shoulderpads
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Shoulderpads recipe.

name: 28-Slot Gossamer Saddlebag
description: 28 Slots

name: Superior Buried Treasure
description:
Obtained during "The Search for Buried Treasure" in the Desert Highlands.

Double-click to open.

name: Chest of the First Room
description: Double-click to open.

name: Sagal's Cavalier Harness of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Cowl
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Cowl recipe.

name: Boots of the Obsidian Path of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Betrayer's Vestments of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Hamaseen Trophy Crate
description:
Can contain vials of blood, bone, or claws.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Fish Carcass
description:
Bring these to Nasim along the coast north of Amnoon to help gather fish.
Event Item

name: Chest of Desert Plants
description: Double-click to open. Contains various plants and 1 Scrap of Desert Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Mini Sunspear Octavia
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Knight's Winged Tunic of the Mesmer
Lily of the Elon Pass
description:
Located in Crystal Oasis
• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Helmet Lining
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Helms.

name: Pauldrons of the Eternal Lieutenant of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Antique Hairpin
description: <c=@Flavor>A traditional style that has lasted for millennia.</c>

name: Mini Shadows Agent Kito
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Page of Spearmarshal Coat Recipes
description:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Coats. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.

name: Elonian Standard
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Anniversary Weapon Pack
description: Double-click to choose an exclusive anniversary weapon.

name: Superior Rune of the Renegade
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Fossilized Wurm Spoor
description: <c=@Flavor>The great Junundu Wurms have lived in these deserts for centuries, and tracking them by a sign is a rite of passage for young adventurers in Vabbi.</c>

name: Faulty Rebreather
description: <c=@Flavor>For something so necessary, it's frightening to realize just how fragile they are.</c>

name: Elonian Helm Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Season 1 Memory Box—Scarlet vs. Lion's Arch
description: Each box contains three items from the second half of Living World Season 1. Each box also drops Nostalgia Tokens that can be exchanged for different items.

name: Inaccurate Caravanserai Map
description: <c=@Flavor>Traders of both conniving and ignorant kinds are known to traffic in maps which are useless at best, and dangerous at worst.</c>

name: Dwarven Dagger Crossguard
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Chest of the Desert Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Thimble of Liquid Karma and 1 Scrap of Desert Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Gift of the Hidden Scion (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Warmed Riparian Griffon Egg
description:
Collect this and return it to the Sanctuary.

Collecting this will also provide bonus desert Mastery experience.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Smasher
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear smasher recipe.

name: Mini Sunspear Darekh
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Cowl
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Vestments
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Vestments recipe.

name: Threat: Zawadi the Turncoat
description:
Double-click to gain a large amount of bonus Mastery experience.
<c=@Flavor>Embolden the Sunspears by taking out notable threats.</c>

name: Mini Mirage Nasrin Davish
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Amnoon Council Seal
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Retrieve this seal to display the authority of Amnoon.</c>

name: Portrait of Joko's Ascension
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Official portraiture is expensive and highly scrutinized, but artists skilled enough to depict Joko flatteringly are accorded great respect.</c>

name: Sunspear Redemption Wish
description: Double-click to examine the contents.

name: Pitcher of Desert-Spiced Coffee
description: Snack Feast: Double-click to set out a Feast of Coffee to share with anyone in the area. Feast stays active for 5 minutes.

name: Assassin's Rascal Boots of the Ranger
Mini Deadeye Nakato Ibori
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Threat: The Terror of the Sands
description:
Double-click to gain a large amount of bonus Mastery experience.
<c=@Flavor>Embolden the Sunspears by taking out notable threats.</c>

name: Mini Scourge Akesi Xuni
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Air Djinn
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Salomon's Dusty Crown of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: House of Daoud Leather Crate
description:
Can contain thick or hardened leather squares.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Shoe Sole
description: Used to craft Gossamer Boots.

name: Guardian Junundu Statue
description: This item only has value when part of a collection.

name: Kito's Secret Cache
description: Double-click to open.

name: Luminous Curio
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Dwarf-Cut Adamantine
description:
This item only has value as part of a collection and can be consumed without preventing progress.

<c=@Flavor>This gemstone was cut with incredible skill by a long-lost technique.</c>

name: Book of Vlast Page 05
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Recipe: Sunset Amulet
description: A recipe to make a Sunset Amulet.

name: Mini Fire Djinn
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Carrion Winged Gloves of the Necromancer
Pristine Skree Harpy Feather
description: Proof of valor against the Skree harpies. Present it to the ghost of First Spear Dehvad in the Desolation for a reward.

name: Trophy of the Champion Deadeye
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: House of Daoud Metal Crate
description:
Can contain ingots of orichalcum or mithril.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Legendary War Insight
description: Combine with 1 Eldritch Scroll, 50 Obsidian Shards, and 1 Cube of Stabilized Dark Energy in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of War Prowess.

name: Elon Sapphire
description:
This item only has value as part of a collection and can be consumed without preventing progress.

<c=@Flavor>This lovely gem has several minute flaws that only enhance its beauty.</c>

name: Threat Report: Thermoptic Flux Readings
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Elonian Shoulder Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Resilient Beam
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The flag of Amnoon pays homage to its naval history.</c>

name: Lateen Sail
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>For protecting Amnoon's independence, you have the honor of bearing this standard.</c>

name: Awakened Bone Column
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Autographed Flyer
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>This is incredible! How exciting! How special! You just got this signed by the most prestigi— Wait, did they misspell your name?</c>

name: Dispatch Page 04
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Cache of the Traveler
description: Double-click to claim your reward.

name: Show of Support: Highjump Ranch
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of trade contracts.
<c=@Flavor>By gathering support from nearby settlements, you can put Amnoon at ease with their independence.</c>

name: Elonian Standard
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The banner of Joko waves eternal over the clans of Elona.</c>

name: Warbeast Gossamer Pant Lining
description: Used to craft Gossamer Leggings.

name: Certificate of Honor
description: Combine with Certificate of Heroics, Condensed Spirit Energy, and 250 Memories of Battle in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of War Dedication.

name: Book of Vlast Page 02
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Elonian Teapot
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Foot Pads
description: Double-click to open.

name: Show of Support: Skimmer Ranch
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of trade contracts.
<c=@Flavor>By gathering support from nearby settlements, you can put Amnoon at ease with their independence.</c>

name: Shinies Bag
description: A bag of shinies bandits stole from Ket'abatchk.

name: Chest of the Bounty Hunter's Coat
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Rampager's Rascal Boots of the Thief
Mini Rock Deer
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Strange Droppings
description: <c=@Flavor>What could be voiding this much excrement from the sky? Perhaps the beastmaster at the menagerie knows more. Double-click to view location.</c>

name: The Legacy Page 07
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Attuned Sigil of the Fool
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Sandstorm Meld Hand
description: Double-click to open your prize and gain special rewards and valuable junk items in random amounts.

name: The Legacy Page 01
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Flask of Vabbian Red
description: <c=@Flavor>Technically a dessert wine, this is a hometown favorite.</c>

name: Imperial Cadastral Suite
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and may be sold to vendors.
<c=@Flavor>Over the course of their reign, land reforms instituted by the Primeval dynasty would give rise to the nations of Kourna, Istan, and Vabbi.</c>

name: Climbing Piton, Never Used
description: <c=@Flavor>It implies a tremendous tragedy.</c>

name: Mini Green Choya
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Superior Rune of the Scourge
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 Healing Power; gain barrier when struck by a foe while below 75% health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 75 Seconds)</c>

name: Luminous Claymore
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Decalibrated Feline Holoscepter
description: This fancifully decorated holoscepter has been repurposed for combat use and no longer interests cats.

name: Marshal's Elonian Tassets
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Attuned Corsair's Ring (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Mini Sunspear Timera
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Dwarven Staff Head
description: A broken piece of a dwarven staff.

name: Chest of the Vabbian Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 10 Trade Contracts, and 1 Scrap of Desert Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Threat Report: Mysterious Saboteurs
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Quick Landscape Sketch
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>In Tooraj's current condition, there's not much he can do, except sketch the incredible view.</c>

name: Embroidered Sunspear Sigil
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>For restoring the alliance between the Sunspears and Amnoon, you've nobly earned this standard.</c>

name: Mini Awakened Abomination
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Intelligence Report: Palawa Joko I Page 04
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Pants
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Book of Vlast Page 07
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Recipe: Mordant Trumpet
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Trumpet recipe.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Helmet
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Mini Sunspear Sogolon
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Warmed Mountain Griffon Egg
description:
Collect this and return it to the Sanctuary.

Collecting this will also provide bonus desert Mastery experience.

name: Mini Firebrand Roni Gehianu
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Dwarven Axe Shaft
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Endless Elemental Tonic Box
description: Contains endless versions of the fire, air, ice, and earth elemental tonics.

name: Permanent Portal Spike Finisher
description: Summon a realm portal spike to finish your opponents.
